channel.title: Imagemaps (Y)
channel.description:
I've just got used to using imagemaps, and to be quite honest, I think they're awesome >_<
I dislike having to make hundreds of divs within my webpages, for text and otherwise, so don't get all flameyy about my image based text (:, I've jsut made a few pages containing nothing but an imagemap, and so far, all i've got back is good feedback.. The reason I made this thread, is that I want some feedback from you guys, Do you like the look of imagemaps? or do you prefer text templates? Sure, templates/text based pages can look more professional, but when designing I like to create something original :I
here's my linkk: www.JamesVisual.com
In the aff's section click on the middle one, which I'm particularly proud of haha, sorry about the hideous blue border around it, but I forgot to add the border 0 attribute >_<
Also, I [b]don'[/b]t normally use freewebs, but my server fucked up =/.
:D

item.title: Imagemaps (Y)
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Hmmm … dont really like it. I mean its alright but it would be nicer if when you highlighted it didnt highlight it like it was one image. That bugs me.

Read full topic

item.title: Imagemaps (Y)
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

just put an inner and outer glow on your pic… make the canvas color whatever your going to set your web page background
